urls.title: HEAT End Road Trip On A High Note, Beat Thunder 108-94 | Miami Heat
urls.description: While the HEAT started off their seven-game road trip a little shaky, they ended it strong. Thanks to some solid defense and a 15-0 run to start the fourth, the HEAT defeated the Thunder 108-94

urls.title: Two Miamis - Coconut Grove
urls.description: Beyond the glitz and glamour there are real people who built this city and their stories deserve to be remembered. . .

data.text:
There are 3 specific historical events that brought Black people to Miami in the late 1800s... One of them resulted in a boom of Black-Owned businesses in Coconut Grove.

@HistoryMiami tells the story in this edition of "Two Miamis" https://t.co/bV7BuDoBhd https://t.co/FWPXybvDzl

#HEATTwitter here‚Äôs your first chance to get back into @AAArena üôå

urls.title: HEAT Get Much-Needed Win Over Kings | Miami Heat
urls.description: Finally back in the win column. Thanks to recording a season-high 36 assists, the HEAT snapped a three-game skid and defeated the Kings 118-110 Thursday night at Golden 1 Center. Oh yeah, two
